snippet.title: THE ARTFUL ESCAPE | Gameplay Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Creative Director Johnny Galvatron talks through what you'll experience in THE ARTFUL ESCAPE. Coming soon to Xbox, PC, and Apple Arcade. Wishlist on Steam now: http://annapurna.link/Artful

On the eve of his first performance, Francis Vendetti battles with the legacy of a dead folk legend and the cosmic wanderings of his own imagination. Francis, a teenage guitar prodigy, sets out on a psychedelic, multidimensional journey to inspire his stage persona.

Developed by BEETHOVEN & DINOSAUR. Published by Annapurna Interactive.

© Annapurna Interactive, 2020
